name: Finger.exe Suspicious Invocation
description: Detects suspicious aged finger.exe tool execution often used in malware attacks nowadays
false_positives: Admin activity (unclear what they do nowadays with finger.exe)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.pe.original_file_name:finger.exe OR process.executable:*\\finger.exe)`
